wikipedia_page.main: Chloe Maggie Kelly (born 15 January 1998) is an English footballer who plays as a forward for Manchester City in the FA WSL and the England national team. She previously played for Arsenal and Everton and represented England on the under-17, under-19 and under-20 national teams.

response: In the quarterfinals of the UEFA Women’s Champions League, Paños saved a penalty from Manchester City’s Chloe Kelly and recorded a clean sheet in a 3–0 win. In May 2021, Paños extended her Barcelona contract to June 2024. Days after announcing her contract extension, she started the second Champions League final of her career and recorded a clean sheet against Chelsea, as the team won the match 4–0. Paños was named to the 2020-21 UEFA Women’s Champions League Squad of the Season, and later won the 2020-21 UEFA Women’s Champions League Goalkeeper of the Season award. At the end of the 2020-21 league season, she had conceded a league-best 12 goals. Paños was  ineligible to win the Zamora Trophy however, as she suffered a thigh injury in October 2020 that kept her out of play for three months, and did not complete in at least 28 matches.
